title: Run It Down Mid Cause Nothing Will Be Done
body:
I played a game recently where my top laner lost her lane so her next decision was to run it down mid. This player went 0/17. I tried to help with positive advice before the person ran it down mid. Didn't care. I will admit it could come off as disrespectful but it was not intended that way. Her and her duo partner report me and I get chat restricted.  I'll post the chat a little later, but guess what happened to the 0/17 top laner?!?!?! NOTHING!!!!!!! Riot decided to do nothing to this person. I checked her game log and this person has played quite a few games since the 0/17 experience. I've been playing for almost five years and I've honestly lost a little respect for RIOT. I even tried to fight this ridiculous chat restriction through player support. Nothing was done. In the end I was told to say nothing to players like this and report them so RIOT can take of them. Still NOTHING was done. Ticket status: CLOSED.

The other people on my team were responding. This wasn't all a one sided conversation. Riot only shows what I wrote which also doesn't seem right. There was more to this show. (The Jax thing was a separate issue. We died bot lane and he dives 1v3 under turret.)

Reported Text:

Game 1
WhiteAsWondabreD: you a pro jax player?
WhiteAsWondabreD: jax, if you're going to do that stay away from our lane
WhiteAsWondabreD: that was pro silly
WhiteAsWondabreD: you a smurf?
WhiteAsWondabreD: your history shows lvl 14
WhiteAsWondabreD: illaoi can i give you a tip?
WhiteAsWondabreD: inting and doing what you are doing gets you reported
WhiteAsWondabreD: if you are losing lane and jg won't help you then roam
WhiteAsWondabreD: a good player will roam to another lane and make a difference
WhiteAsWondabreD: the game is not over yet
WhiteAsWondabreD: you can still make a difference
WhiteAsWondabreD: does not matter if it's normals or not
WhiteAsWondabreD: you should play to win
WhiteAsWondabreD: i'd be willing to bet you do this in ranked too
WhiteAsWondabreD: just afk
WhiteAsWondabreD: at least then you're not helping them
WhiteAsWondabreD: is it really?
WhiteAsWondabreD: if you're being honest with yourself, you lose lane then think i know this will be fu
WhiteAsWondabreD: whatever you're trash
WhiteAsWondabreD: have fun in school tomorrow. seriously hope you learn something
WhiteAsWondabreD: please report this illaoi
WhiteAsWondabreD: this is killing the whole game
WhiteAsWondabreD: we arent' feedin
WhiteAsWondabreD: we are actually playing, you don't see a difference in what we are doing?
WhiteAsWondabreD: does it matter anymore?
WhiteAsWondabreD: diana are you playing with illaoi?
WhiteAsWondabreD: the only one to defend such garbage
WhiteAsWondabreD: ii figured
WhiteAsWondabreD: no comparison
WhiteAsWondabreD: i would never do wht you are doing
WhiteAsWondabreD: just want to play a game

replies.body:
There is usually a delay in punishments for gameplay toxicity (trolling/inting) because they don't want to ban those who are just bad. 

Ad for the ticket, yes it will be closed because they won't tell others if a specific account was banned. If they did, it would be a privacy issue. Instant feedback reports are unreliable for pop ups too.

Riot didn't decide to do anything. Report system is automated.

Int feeding takes like 30 games of going 0/17 to have anything happen.

You're estimating I hope. I genuinely love this game and try to play well. I would never run it down mid and screw my team over. This is sickening and being punished from this 0/17 troll is intolerable!
you are punished for what you did, it doesn't matter what they said or did, if they inted, report them, no one is asking you to give them advice and looking at a chat ban, unhelpful/rude advice.

What they do should matter! Their actions affect everyone in the game. If I don't want to listen to someone I mute them. How can you stop someone from inting? You can't. If my words are penalized more than my actions then what is the point? In game I say hey how's it going but then I make sure your lane has 17 kills over you. You're telling me that doesn't matter? That is an idiotic philosophy.
You can't control what other people do, you can control how you act.

I did not act up that bad for a restriction. My whole argument is that what few things I said versus the feed, the feed was by far worse and that person goes unpunished. I posted the chat above. It may not be good, but it's not half as bad as some of the things I've reported people on or that any of us have seen. There should be more immediate responses from the automated system if the person specifically says they're going to run it down mid then go 0/17. That should be a red flag!

>I did not act up that bad for a restriction

The people who reported you disagree; and the fact that the mild level of negativity got you a chat restrict means that it wasn't your first time either. You've been tapped on the shoulder and asked to not do that anymore.

Bad chat detection is always going to work better than inting detection.

> [{quoted}](name=Karunamon,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=AuqMfXL2,comment-id=00010000000000000000,timestamp=2018-04-20T14:35:07.982+0000)
>
> The people who reported you disagree; and the fact that the mild level of negativity got you a chat restrict means that it wasn't your first time either. You've been tapped on the shoulder and asked to not do that anymore.
> 
> Bad chat detection is always going to work better than inting detection.

Okay let's put it this way. If I were to poll any LoL player, what do you feel should be punished more? Someone you can mute and you have that control or someone who feeds the game to the other team? For me it's easy. If someone says something I don't like I have control over their chat and pings. This person who felt it necessary to throw the game ruined the experience for everyone. I guarantee my participation in anything negative is low. Everyone seems to be defending feeding behavior. I don't remember the last time I honored someone for inting.

What part of "Bad chat detection is always going to work better than inting detection" was I unclear on? Where has anyone on this entire fucking board defending intentional feeding?

Whether they were feeding or not is completely irrelevant to why you received a chat ban.

> [{quoted}](name=Karunamon,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=AuqMfXL2,comment-id=0001000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2018-04-20T15:16:38.809+0000)
>
> What part of "Bad chat detection is always going to work better than inting detection" was I unclear on? Where has anyone on this entire fucking board defending intentional feeding?
> 
> Whether they were feeding or not is completely irrelevant to why you received a chat ban.

So out of this whole post you focused on my chat restriction. Again, the guy fed 0/17 ran it down mid on purpose. Chat restriction aside, the guy purposely threw that game. Not a single person including you even looks at the situation with the feeder. Oh you got chat restricted...no crap. What did the 0/17 feed get? Nothing. My whole point has been that and not even your keen detection skills can lock that down. Lee Sin could even see this was a crap. You seem to be perfectly fine with the guy doing  this but watch your chat because that is by far worse.
